subject: Re: TAPSCON Clearwater Florida
author: kolrone
full_text: If you go to http://tapscon.com, there is a Discuss link that leads to the forum. That may help. I also emailed info@..., maybe try that too. If you go to the FAQs on the site there are a few other emaills listed. Sorry if it's taking a while to respond. The reply by email doesn't seem to want to work for me, and my work blocks out yahoo groups, so I'm doing all my emailing through my phone.
